title: Enhancing Visualization Competencies of Mathematical Concepts via Infographic-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: A course for professionals to efficiently learn complex mathematical concepts required in the workplace using visual tools, with a learning environment built solely using smartphones and mobile apps (no PCs).

learning_goals: Learners can transform mathematical formulas into infographics using five principles of data visualization
Learners can visually represent work-related statistical data using infographic creation tools on mobile devices
Learners can provide feedback on peers' infographic works based on visual literacy evaluation criteria (clarity, accuracy, visual hierarchy).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
